box2D.dynamics.controllers.B2Controller

type
class
Base class for controllers. Controllers are a convience for encapsulating common per-step functionality.

Instance Variables

m_bodyCount : Int

m_bodyList : B2ControllerEdge

m_next : B2Controller

m_prev : B2Controller

m_world : box2D.dynamics.B2World

Instance Methods

addBody(body : box2D.dynamics.B2Body) : Void

clear() : Void

draw(debugDraw : box2D.dynamics.B2DebugDraw) : Void

getBodyList() : B2ControllerEdge

getNext() : B2Controller

getWorld() : box2D.dynamics.B2World

removeBody(body : box2D.dynamics.B2Body) : Void

step(step : box2D.dynamics.B2TimeStep) : Void
